response.overview: The dorm is very old and huge, Collins Hall. Collins Hall mean for boys who lives in Independent dorm. Founded by John Collins in 1859 at Alabama School for the Deaf. Collins Hall doesn't seem to make the boys more independent themselves because the boys are fear to live in this dorm; they want to move to another dorm. Bratt Billups, as a junior at Alabama School for the Deaf. He's a leader and has good grades in all classes.
response.title: Battle of Evil
